name: The Godfrey Hotel Boston
description: No description found

name: citizenM Boston North Station
description: Attractively located in Boston, citizenM Boston North Station has air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a business center. Guests can have a drink at the bar. At the hotel, rooms contain a desk, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room is equipped with a safety deposit box and some have city views. The rooms in citizenM Boston North Station are equipped with free toiletries and an iPad. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Boston North Station, TD Garden and Freedom Trail. The nearest airport is Logan Airport, 3.1 miles from citizenM Boston North Station.

name: Yotel Boston
description: YOTEL Boston offers comfortable accommodation and is a brief walk from Courthouse Bus Station. It provides complimentary Wi-Fi, meeting rooms and an express check-in and check-out feature. Guests of this 4-star hotel can plan sightseeing trips with the assistance of the tour desk. The front desk operates around the clock and the friendly staff can suggest sights to visit and provide other tourist information. All rooms are air conditioned, soundproofed and equipped with a laptop safe, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. They all offer heating, an in-room safe and an in-room closet. Those staying at YOTEL Boston can relax at the in-house bar, ideally based for a drink. The hotel is within walking distance of Boston Convention and Exhibition Center, Long Wharf Boston and New England Aquarium. It is within a 20-minute stroll of South Station, which allows convenient access in and around Boston.Revato

name: Hyatt Regency Boston
description: Ideally located in the Boston City Center area, Hyatt Regency Boston promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the property provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Hyatt Regency Boston. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Friendly staff, great facilities, and close proximity to all that Boston (MA) has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Hyatt Regency Boston.Agoda

name: Revere Hotel Boston Common
description: Located in downtown Boston, this redesigned boutique hotel is within a 1640 feet radius from attractions like Boston Common and Newbury Street. It features walls decorated with local arts and offers a rooftop terrace with views of the city and Back Bay. Each room at Revere Hotel Boston Common also features a 55" flat-screen HDTV, Cuisinart coffee maker and plush bedding. Free Wi-Fi is available. Guests can work out in the 24-hour fitness center. Dining options include the A la Carte breakfast, available for a surcharge. Rooftop@Revere is a seasonal rooftop venue where guests can enjoy a cocktail. Revere Hotel Boston Common is 5.3 mi away from Logan International Airport and 2.2 mi away from Fenway Park. Boston Public Garden is 984 feet away.

name: Club Quarters Hotel Faneuil Hall, Boston
description: Located 558 feet away from Post Office Square in Boston's Financial District, this hotel is 1804 feet away from the Orpheum Theater. It features an on-site restaurant and modern rooms with free Wi-Fi. A flat-screen TV and iPod docking station are included in the guest rooms at Club Quarters Hotel Faneuil Hall, Boston. They are furnished with picture windows and a hardwood desk. In the lounge of Boston Club Quarters, guests can relax with a cup of coffee in front of the fireplace. The Elephant & Castle Pub and Restaurant features a range of British dishes and North American favorites. The on-site gym features floor-to-ceiling mirrors and a mounted TV. A business center is located off of the lobby. Club Quarters Boston is 919 feet from the Downtown Crossing Market and 2133 feet from Fanueil Hall and Quincy Market.

name: Renaissance Boston Waterfront Hotel
description: Renaissance Boston Waterfront Hotel invites guests to relax amidst well-appointed accommodations, modern hotel amenities and a scenic waterfront location on Congress St. Visit Capiz Lounge, our bar and lounge in the Seaport District, for craft cocktails and light bites. Recharge with a swim in our indoor pool or work out in our hotel's well-equipped fitness center. After an eventful day exploring Boston, relax in your hotel room or suite, which features a marble bathroom, plush pillowtop mattress and sweeping views of the Boston waterfront. Enjoy easy access to Logan Airport and the Boston Convention and Exhibition Center from our Seaport District hotel and access many top attractions in Boston, MA, via water taxi transport. We also offer more than 20,000 square feet of meeting and event space in Boston, making our boutique hotel the perfect destination for conferences, weddings and social events. Chart your own course at Renaissance Boston Waterfront Hotel.Marriott

name: Harborside Inn
description: Originally built in 1846 as a mercantile shipping warehouse on the Boston harbor, the Harborside Inn has been completely renovated to create a European style boutique hotel which features a hip cocktail lounge.Here, a "classic modernism" design is accented with the latest high technology amenities to satisfy the most savvy business or leisure traveler. Premier location. Exceptional value. European ambiance. The Harborside Inn combines it all to create a memorable lodging experience.All 200 guest rooms at The Harborside Inn are uniquely styled by custom designed to provide the ultimate combination of luxury, comfort, and functionality. From custom made furniture and Teak woodwork to imported Italian tile and nautical lighting fixtures, each room presents a soft modern motif with a residential feel.State-of-the-art amenities include free wireless internet with free 24 hour 1-800 technical support, stereo systems, DVD/CD players, HD televisions, voicemail, a movie library, individual climate control, and other custom appointments.Our highly trained staff will cater to your needs and provide genuine, warm, and intimate service that can only truly be provided at an independent owner-operated hotel. The Harborside Inn experience will make us your first choice when staying in Boston's Historic Waterfront neighborhood.iHotelier/iStay

name: Boston Omni Parker House Hotel
description: On the Freedom Trail and a short walk from Boston Common, this luxury historic hotel features a full-service restaurant, a 24-hour business center, and WiFi. Thirteen historic sites from the Freedom Trail are in close proximity. The rooms at the Boston Omni Parker House Hotel have a flat-screen cable TV and an MP3 dock. Plush bathrobes, a coffee maker and ironing facilities are included. Parker’s Restaurant serves local specialties including Boston cream pie and the Parker House Roll. The Last Hooray offers a light fare, specialty cocktails and a large selection of brand whiskey. The hotel has a 24-hour fitness center and a map of local jogging trails. A backpack full of games and activities can be requested for children. The Omni Parker House is 2.7 mi from the Fenway Park and Logan International Airport is 4 mi away.

name: Hilton Boston Logan Airport
description: The airport's only connected and AAA Four Diamond hotel. Hilton Boston Logan Airport is located just two miles to downtown, connecting you to it all. Experience the convenience of being in your room in minutes, whether walking via directly connected, climate-controlled walkways or using our 24-hour courtesy shuttle. Complimentary shuttle also provides service to the subway, car rental facility, and water taxi. Text or call 617-681-8899 to request a ride. Just 10 minutes from Boston's key destinations and iconic neighborhoods including the Boston Convention & Exhibition Center, Hynes Center, Sea Port, and North-End. Located in a park-like setting, the hotel offers guests a unique vantage point of the Boston city skyline or aeronautical views from our well-appointed guest rooms. Each of our relaxing guest rooms feature triple-pane windows and lush bedding for a restful night's stay. From hearty breakfasts to light bites, our hotel provides innovative dishes prepared with the freshest ingredients. Looking for a pick-me-up? Café Presto offers Starbucks coffee, freshly baked pastries, and a variety of to-go options during the day as well as evening beer and wine options, while Connolly's Publik House believes in quality food and drink in a relaxed atmosphere. Stay connected with AAA Four Diamond Amenities for personal success on the road, including full-service dining options, room service, a grab-and-go cafe, Fitness Center, indoor pool, Digital Check-in and Digital Key, and 24-hour guest assistance via text. Create meaningful connections and engage attendees with over 30,000 square feet of space including two pillar-less ballrooms, spacious foyers for networking, sophisticated, media-ready boardrooms, and multi-purpose breakout rooms. Our unique indoor/outdoor catering spaces are the perfect back drop to design an incredible event experience any time of year.Hilton

name: The Westin Boston Seaport District
description: Whether you're traveling far or planning the staycation of a lifetime, make it count at The Westin Boston Seaport District. A vibrant neighborhood in an iconic city, the Seaport District offers rich history, world-famous attractions, and hidden gems for those who want to take the path less traveled. We are close to family-friendly fun at Boston Children's Museum, stunning exhibits at the Institute of Contemporary Art, and much more. Whatever adventure you choose, come home at the end of the day to stylish accommodations with everything you need to recharge for the next one when you book at our outstanding hotel. When you're not out exploring the city, enjoy our 24-hour WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio, plush Heavenly® Beds, full-service on-site Starbucks® and casual dining options.Marriott

name: Canopy by Hilton Boston Downtown
description: Surrounded by markets, restaurants, and parks, our hotel is tucked between downtown and Boston's historic North End. Our Canopy Bikes are perfect for sightseeing, with several trails and famous historic sites within half a mile. We're also within walking distance of TD Garden, Government Center, Faneuil Hall, and the Freedom Trail.Hilton

name: The Envoy Hotel Autograph Collection
description: Part homage to the inspired community that surrounds it, part ode to the Innovation District it calls home, The Envoy Hotel ascends—a new genre of hospitality cast in a very original way. A visionary hotel, The Envoy is an inviting hybrid of comfort and creativity. Our mission is to inspire and delight. Our vessel, a modern building radiating with light and glass, and providing intimate views of the city and toward the harbor.Designed from the ground up to be a beacon of uncommonly forward-thinking accommodation, The Envoy Hotel draws visitors just a few steps outside the ordinary. Those looking for artful, guest-centric touches in every detail. Uncompromising, yet unpretentious spaces with surprising flavor are around every corner. From our 136 stunningly appointed guest rooms and suites to our fiercely inspiring gathering areas to our award-winning dining establishments, Lookout Rooftop and Para Maria, The Envoy is equal parts fearless and approachable at every level imaginable.Marriott

name: The Westin Copley Place, Boston
description: Step into a AAA Four-Diamond hotel in the celebrated Back Bay neighborhood of Boston, MA which is a short stroll from fine dining destinations and upscale clothing stores at Copley Place shopping mall. Boston Symphony Hall, Fenway Park and other downtown attractions are within easy reach of The Westin Copley Place, Boston. Explore with ease and return to family-friendly accommodations and amenities. Exercise at our 24-hour WestinWORKOUT Fitness Studio with Pelotons, eat at delicious on-site restaurants and sip on handcrafted cocktails at our welcoming lobby bar. In the evening, relax in a beautifully appointed, pet-friendly hotel room or suite with stylish décor, a signature Westin Heavenly Bed and a spacious bathroom. Our impressive 57,493 square feet of contemporary event space makes us a leading conference, wedding and event destination in downtown Boston, MA. We look forward to meeting you, providing for you and helping you hit your targets at The Westin Copley Place, Boston.Marriott

name: Element Boston Seaport District
description: Learn the definition of comfort at the Element Boston Seaport District. Rise and enjoy our complimentary hot breakfast offerings. Our Chef is ready to prepare your eggs, fresh to the style you desire, or fuel your day at our Chobani yogurt station. A quick two-mile trip from Boston airport, we're located across the street from the Boston Convention and Exhibition Center and nearby Black Falcon Cruise Terminal. We even have free loaner bikes available to help you avoid city traffic. Relax in a contemporary room or suite, with a fully equipped kitchen and an inspiring city view. Take a dip in our saltwater indoor pool and break a vacation sweat at our fitness center. Countless modern amenities will make your extended stay well worth the while. If you have to mix work with pleasure, make use of your in-room ergonomic workstation or book one of our meeting rooms for a productive environment. Whatever brings you to the area, know that our extended-stay hotel in Boston, MA, will treat you to an outstanding stay.Marriott

name: W Boston
description: Immerse in the music, fashion and art of the downtown district. W Boston is a contemporary hotel in downtown Boston, Massachusetts, of style and sophistication. Comfort awaits in boutique, renovated hotel rooms showcasing signature amenities, custom décor and stunning views of our iconic Theatre District. Your enhanced accommodations include slate-finished bathrooms, innovative entertainment technology and custom murals. Savor New England staples and international dishes at the Gallery Restaurant and W Lounge. We also offer vibrant event spaces for any gathering in this historic destination. When you're ready to tackle the city, attend a Broadway show, shop locally or explore celebrated attractions, including Fenway Park, New England Aquarium and Chinatown. Our luxury downtown Boston, MA hotel is refinement redefined.Marriott

name: Hotel Commonwealth
description: Located within walking distance of St. Marys Street MBTA Subway Station, Hotel Commonwealth provides guests with an ideal base while in Boston. Some of the popular features at this luxury 4-star hotel include a rooftop terrace and free Wi-Fi. There are a range of amenities on offer to those staying at Hotel Commonwealth, including 24-hour room service, meeting rooms and valet parking. Corporate facilities include a 24-hour business centre. Every traditional room at Hotel Commonwealth provides a refrigerator and all the necessities for a comfortable stay. During their stay at the hotel, guests can enjoy a meal at Island Creek Oyster Bar, which offers a menu including seafood specialties. In the evening, guests are able to relax in the comfortable lounge bar. Located a 10-minute walk from Hynes Convention Center MBTA Station, Hotel Commonwealth offers helpful staff to provide tips on what to see in Boston. Guests will find a wide range of restaurants and shops in the area.HotelsCombined

name: Seaport Hotel Boston
description: Located on the waterfront in the bustling Seaport District, the AAA Four Diamond Seaport Boston Hotel offers luxurious accommodations with stunning city and harbor views and incredibly convenient access to all major points of interest. Seaport Boston Hotels gracious and accommodating staff provides unparalleled service, and the hotels innovative amenities, including complimentary wireless internet access, service-inclusive policy and complimentary use of Wave Health & Fitness are sure to delight.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hilton Garden Inn Boston Logan Airport
description: The Hilton Garden Inn Boston Logan Airport (BOS) is conveniently located 1 mile from Logan Airport, just minutes from downtown Boston. Free 24 hour Airport Shuttle service to airport and Subway/Train Station and daily parking for a fee during your stay. Our tastefully-appointed hotel features modern conveniences suited to the savvy business traveler, along with a great location and amenities to please leisure guests. Spacious new guestrooms boast a long list of guest amenities including Keurig Coffee Makers, generous work surfaces and all rooms are complete with microwaves and refrigerators and Complimentary high-speed internet access. For your convenience, wireless HSIA is available in public areas throughout the hotel. Our guests have full use of our amenities including: indoor heated pool, well-equipped Fitness Center and Hotel features the Garden Grille & Bar on-site as well as many restaurants and retails shops nearby. The Hilton Garden Inn Boston Logan Airport has 2,100 square feet of flexible meeting and banquet facilities including 500 square feet of pre-function space and separate Boardroom. Hotel also offers state-of-the-art audiovisual equipment, a Business Center, creative on-site catering services and a professional staff to anticipate your needs and flawlessly execute your successful business conference, training seminar, reception, or gala social event. You Can Count on Us! to provide a great value whether you are traveling on business, a vacation, or weekend getaway to Boston, our courteous hotel team looks forward to welcoming you! Guaranteed!Hilton

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Boston South Bay
description: Enjoy our new Home2 Suites by Hilton, located in the bustling South Bay area of South Boston. Ideal for an extended stay, we are close to the Boston Medical District, Boston-Logan Airport and the Boston Convention and Exhibition Center BCEC. We are within walking distance to Andrew Train Station MBTA which is 3 stops from downtown Boston. Complimentary breakfast buffet. We are within walking distance to many shops, restaurants and a 12-screen movie theatre. We have on site guest laundry as well as a fitness center. Free WiFi. 24-hour market. All rooms feature a sofa bed, full size refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, and garbage disposal.Hilton

name: The Dagny Boston
description: Location The hotel is located on Broad Street, three blocks from Faneuil Hall Marketplace in Boston, Massachusetts. The New England Aquarium, Boston Harbour and The Freedom Trail are three blocks away. Logan International Airport is located less than 63.5 km from the hotel. Facilities The hotel features 362 accommodation units. Guests of the hotel are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. Lift access is provided to the upper floors. Amenities include a cloakroom and a safe. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room and a bar. Guests can buy holiday mementos from the souvenir shop. Shopping facilities are available. Additional features of the hotel include a newspaper stand and a library. Guests travelling in their own vehicles can make use of the available parking spaces (for a fee). Guests can also use the bicycle storage facilities. Additional services include room service and a laundry. A conference area with a conference room and a business centre is available. Rooms All rooms feature air conditioning, central heating, a living room and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. The carpeted accommodation units feature a double bed, a king-size bed or a sofa-bed. A minibar is also available. A fridge, a mini-fridge, a microwave and tea and coffee making equipment contribute to a comfortable stay. An ironing set is also available to guests. Each accommodation unit offers internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio, a stereo system and an alarm clock. Wheelchair-accessible accommodation units are also bookable. Each of the bathrooms features a shower, a bathtub, a hairdryer and bathrobes. Sports/Entertainment The hotel offers guests leisure options, including a gym. Meals The hotel offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: American Express, VISA and MasterCard.WebBeds

name: Hyatt Regency Boston Harbor
description: Located at the Logan International Airport, this Hyatt with soundproof rooms features free transportation to the airport terminals and is 4 miles from the Boston Common and the Freedom Trail. Views of Boston and the Boston Harbor can be enjoyed from some rooms at the Hyatt Boston Harbor. The rooms also have a flat-screen cable TV and an iPod docking station. Exercising in the on-site fitness center is an option for guests staying at the Boston Harbor Hyatt. The hotel also has on-site dining. The ferry to downtown Boston is available at the Logan Aiport Ferry Terminal and is nearby the hotel. Faneuil Hall and Quincy Market are within a 9-minute drive of the hotel. The USS Constitution and the USS Constitution Museum are 5 miles away.

name: Hyatt Centric Faneuil Hall Boston
description: Located in the heart of Downtown Boston, this Hyatt is a short walk from shopping and dining at historic Faneuil Hall. Guests can work up a sweat in the fitness center or grab a bite to eat at the on-site restaurant. Complimentary WiFi is provided for all guests. Boston Common is a 7 minutes' walk from the hotel. Rooms feature a 55-inch flat-screen TV with cable channels. A refrigerator and coffee maker are provided as well. Amenities such as Bluetooth speakers and blackout curtains are offered as well. Guests will appreciate the convenience of in-room dining. Business travelers will enjoy the business center and meeting facilities. The Lobby Bar offers handmade cocktails. Boston Tea Party Ship & Museum is 1969 feet from Hyatt Centric Faneuil Hall Boston, while Quincy Market is a 10-minute walk away. Logan Airport is 3.7 mi from the property.

name: Omni Boston Hotel at the Seaport
description: Located in Boston, 1.6 miles from Carson Beach, Omni Boston Hotel at the Seaport has accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness center and a terrace. With a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. At Omni Boston Hotel at the Seaport rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American or a vegetarian breakfast. The property has an in-house hot tub, hairdresser's and business center. Popular points of interest near Omni Boston Hotel at the Seaport include Boston Convention Exhibitors Center, Boston Tea Party Ship & Museum and Boston South Station. The nearest airport is Logan Airport, 3.1 miles from the hotel.

name: Le Méridien Boston Cambridge
description: Anchoring the renowned University Park at MIT, Le Méridien Cambridge-MIT stands amidst an area legendary for its infrastructure of invention. The Boston/Cambridge area is a cultural capital of the US including world-renowned music ensembles like The Boston Symphony Orchestra, the Handel and Haydn Society, in addition to hundreds of museums, such as the Museum of Fine Arts, the Museum of Science and the Children's Museum. Le Méridien Cambridge-MIT's elegant guest rooms and suites offer a place of luxurious sanctuary and unmatched comfort.Marriott

name: Aloft Boston Seaport District
description: Aloft Boston Seaport District moves to its own beat. Sitting steps from South Boston, we’re neighbors with Lawn on D and their pickleball courts, Boston Convention & Exhibition Center, the Leaderbank Pavilion, the Boston Tea Party Museum and endless nightlife outlets. Fuel your fun-filled day in Boston with our Re:Fuel breakfast and end the night with a David Bowie-themed cocktail with live performances at our WXYZ Bar. If you’re here to get things done, host your meeting in one of our various tech-savvy, vibrant spaces. Our chef curated an event menu that’ll rock your world. When you’re free take a dip in our indoor pool, shoot the cue at our pool table, or play cornhole outside in our Backyard patio. We get it; pets are family too – we have everything you need to make your pet feel at home! Our South Boston hotel welcomes all self-expressers for any type of travel. Treat you or your guests to creative inspirations at every corner today.Marriott

name: Courtyard by Marriott Boston Downtown/North Station
description: Our hotel in Downtown Boston features a modern, sophisticated design that marries our urban location with a tranquil energy. At 14 stories with 220 rooms, we have 2500 sq. ft. of meeting space and "The Bistro". We offer breakfast, dinner and a full bar for you to socialize and unwind. Our hotel near North End Boston is conveniently located within walking distance of TD Garden, home of the Boston Celtics and Boston Bruins. Boston’s Financial Center and Government Center are all within close proximity along with major transportation hubs such as Boston North Station, Logan International Airport and all major highways. The Courtyard Boston Downtown North Station places guests in the ideal spot to enjoy all that Boston has to offer.Marriott

name: Hyatt Place Boston/Seaport District
description: Located in Boston, 0.7 mi from Boston Convention Exhibitors Center, Hyatt Place Boston/Seaport District provides accommodations with a restaurant, private parking, a fitness center and a terrace. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and an ATM, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 1.5 mi from Freedom Trail and 1.6 mi from Custom House. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental or an American breakfast. Guests at Hyatt Place Boston/Seaport District will be able to enjoy activities in and around Boston, like cycling. There is an on-site snack bar and guests can also make use of the business area. Old State House is 1.4 mi from the accommodations, while Faneuil Hall is 1.5 mi away. The nearest airport is Logan Airport, 3.7 mi from Hyatt Place Boston/Seaport District. Per the City of Boston, beginning January 15, 2022, to address rising COVID-19 cases and encourage vaccination, individuals will be required to show proof of vaccination against COVID-19 in order to enter certain indoor spaces in Boston. For our hotel this would apply for the gym, 9Dot bar and breakfast area. Those unable to show proof of vaccination can take the food to go.

name: Hotel Aka Boston Common
description: Conveniently located in the center of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Boston. It is close to Boston Freedom Trail, restaurants and shops. There are a variety of facilities at Hotel AKA Boston Common that guests can enjoy, such as free Wi-Fi, an express check-in and check-out feature and a gym. Staff are available 24/7 and can book tours and tickets. Rooms at Hotel AKA Boston Common provide a stylish space to relax, complete with an iPod docking station and a flat-screen TV. Each includes its very own bathroom with bathrobes and a hair dryer. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to enjoy a meal. The hotel is ideally located for exploring Boston with Faneuil Hall and Boston Commons within a 10-minute walk. It is also within walking distance of New England Aquarium and TD Garden.HotelsCombined

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Boston Downtown/Seaport
description: The boutique style Residence Inn by Marriott® Boston Downtown/Seaport offers 120 suites style rooms with fully equipped kitchens. Located in the heart of Boston’s highly sought after Seaport District & walking distance to the harbor front, many restaurants, shopping, Boston Convention & Events Center, Boston’s financial district & many one-of-a-kind attractions. Start your day with a complimentary breakfast served in the hotel’s breakfast room or relax in the hotel’s lobby while enjoying the hotel’s unique architecture & history. Traveling on business? Enjoy access to a 24hrs business center, complimentary Wi-Fi & and in-room work desk. The hotel offers a private meeting space to accommodate up to 20 people comfortably & the hotel’s unique Atrium can accommodate up to 70 people for private functions. Regardless of the purpose of your trip, the Residence Inn by Marriott® Boston Downtown/Seaport is sure to please any discerning traveler.Marriott

name: Raffles Boston
description: A celebration of Boston's exceptional talent, culture and character. In the heart of the Back Bay neighborhood, surrounded by historic brownstones, storied cultural institutions, bustling sidewalk cafes and chic boutiques, Raffles Boston offers an unmatched experience for those who want to discover the City of Notions at its finest. A captivating gastronomic destination sparking curiosity at every turn, this stately home is where culture meets indulgence.accorhotels.com

name: Hampton Inn Boston Seaport District
description: Our hotel near the waterfront is five minutes' walk from Flynn Cruise Terminal. The BCEC, wharf parks, Leader Bank Pavilion, and local dining are all within a mile. We have comforts covered with breakfast, WiFi, a business center, and 24-hour fitness center – all free. Enjoy our indoor pool and host a meeting in a sunlit ballroom with harbor views.Hilton

name: Encore Boston Harbor
description: Located in Everett, Encore Boston Harbor Resort is a perfect starting point from which to explore Everett (MA). The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Facilities like 24-hour room service, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, gift/souvenir shop, postal service are readily available for you to enjoy. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer flat screen television, linens, mirror, towels, smoke detector to ensure a restful night. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room, or take advantage of the fitness center, massage. Discover all Everett (MA) has to offer by making Encore Boston Harbor Resort your base.priceline.com

name: The Langham, Boston
description: This historic, newly renovated 5-star hotel in downtown Boston was originally the Federal Reserve Bank. It overlooks Norman B. Leventhal Park and features gourmet dining, guestrooms and event spaces, a heated indoor swimming pool and a 24-hour fitness center. A 50-inch LED HD-TV with streaming capabilities and mini-bar are in every Hotel Langham room. The Faneuil Hall Marketplace, New England Aquarium and the Freedom Trail Foundation are all one-half mile from The Langham, Boston. The Boston Convention Center is 1 mile away. Italian family-style meals are prepared in Grana, the new classic restaurant located in the former Federal Reserve Bank’s grand hall. The Fed, a cocktail bar will serve craft cocktails, beers and elevated pub dishes. Each room is designed with blue colors with custom furniture and features an Italian marble bathroom with plush bathrobes and slippers.

name: Mandarin Oriental, Boston
description: This 5-star hotel is located in the historic Back Bay district in Boston. It offers a full-service spa, a gourmet restaurant and a full-service gym. WiFi access is available. Each room at the Mandarin Oriental Boston will provide you with a TV, a mini-bar and designer linens. En suite marble bathrooms feature a bath or shower. Extras include a seating area, a DVD player and cable channels. The on-site spa is one of the only Forbes Five-Star awarded spas in Massachusetts. Guests can also enjoy the on-site French restaurant Bar Boulud as well as cocktails at the hotel's M Bar & Lounge. Other facilities at the Mandarin Oriental Boston include a fitness center, a ticket service and on-site shopping. The hotel is located next to The Shops at Prudential Center, 656 feet from Hynes Convention Center and 984 feet from Prudential Tower. Logan International Airport is 3.7 mi away.

name: The Liberty, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Boston
description: The Liberty, a Luxury Collection Hotel, in Boston, blends history, sophistication and hometown warmth and is the ideal place for a quintessentially Boston experience. Located at the foot of Beacon Hill, our Boston Jail hotel is steps away from outdoor fun on the Esplanade and posh shopping along Charles Street. A national historic landmark and architectural gem built in 1851, this refined 298-room hotel originated as the storied Charles Street Jail. Today, our prominent location showcases sweeping views of the Boston city skyline and the Charles River, along with five distinct food and beverage venues and 14,000 square feet of meeting space. Reserve your stay at The Liberty Hotel and delight in our rich history, unique architecture and a team of passionate New England natives, ready to create an unrivaled guest experience in Boston, MA.Marriott

name: Embassy Suites Boston at Logan Airport
description: Complimentary 24-hour shuttle service to Logan International Airport. All two room suites. Next to Logan International Airport. Less than 2 miles from Downtown Boston. A first-rate option for Boston Logan Airport hotels When traveling to historic Boston, check-in to the Embassy Suites Boston Hotel - at Logan Airport and be welcomed with amply appointed hotel accommodations and warm hospitality in an unmatched locale. Boston Logan Airport and to the MBTA Blue Line Subway Station. Whether in town for meetings or sightseeing, this Boston, Massachusetts hotel places you within easy reach of famous Boston tourist attractions from historical destinations and museums to universities and sports venues including: Bayside Expo Center - 6 miles, Boston Downtown Crossing - 3.9 miles, Boston Duck Tours - 6.0 miles, Boston Museum of Science - 5.7 miles, Boston University - 7.35 miles, Bunker Hill Monument - 5.5 miles, Faneuil Hall - 3 miles, Fenway Park, Home of the Boston Red Sox - 8 miles, Freedom Trail - 4 miles, Harvard University - 8 miles, Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) - 7 miles, New England Aquarium - 4 miles, TD Banknorth Garden, Home of the Boston Celtics - 5 miles, USS Constitution - 4 miles. Unpack your bags in our hotel and relax in a spacious two-room suite, surrounded by the touches of home, including a sofa bed, microwave, wet bar, coffee maker and high-speed Internet access. Thoughtful conveniences continue throughout our Logan Airport hotel with extensive on-site facilities and amenities, such as: Business Center, so you can meet your last-minute deadlines, Complimentary Breakfast, a delicious start to your day, Complimentary Shuttle, transporting guests to Logan Airport and the MBTA Blue Line subway terminal, Heated Indoor Pool and whirlpool, to unwind after an eventful day, Fitness Center, so you can stay on top of your exercise regimen, Meeting & Event Space, a top choice for Boston corporate events, featuring over 8,000 square feet for up to 300 guests. Make your hotel reservations at Embassy Suites to experience one of the most ideally located hotels near downtown and Boston Logan Airport. Leisure visitors can hop on the Old Towne Trolley Tours bus just outside our doors and business guests will appreciate our proximity to the Boston Convention & Exhibition Center and the Boston Financial District. Book your stay online at the Embassy Suites Boston, MA hotel - at Logan Airport hotel to take advantage of our Lowest Internet Rate Guarantee. Don't forget to check our valuable Boston hotel deals for spectacular savings!Hilton

name: Battery Wharf Hotel, Boston Waterfront
description: Located in the North End by Boston Harbor, Battery Wharf Hotel is a 10-minute walk from the New England Aquarium and offers a private water taxi to Logan International Airport. It features an on-site Exhale Spa. Each contemporary guest room at The Battery Wharf Hotel and Spa is equipped with a 42-inch flat-screen TV, a hardwood desk and a Nespresso coffee machine. The bathroom has a walk-in shower and vanity mirror with bathrobes. The on-site gym features a variety of cardio machines open 24 hours. The Battery Wharf Hotel is located right on the Boston Harbor Walk with a Maritime Museum on-site. The TD Garden is 0.5 mi away, Faneil Hall Marketplace is 0.2 mi away, The Boston Opera House is 1.7 mi away, while the Boston Tea Party Ships and Museum is 0.7 mi away from the hotel.

name: The Eliot Hotel
description: Built in 1925, the historic Eliot Hotel is located in Boston’s Back Bay neighborhood. It offers an on-site sashimi bar and elegantly decorated rooms with down comforters and marble bathrooms. Each room is equipped with soundproof windows, flat-screen TVs and WiFi internet. The Eliot’s guests can enjoy free access to the Boston Sports Club and on-site business center. Concierge desk staff can arrange dinner reservations or nightly turndown service. Babysitting and petsitting are also available. The restaurant Uni is located in the hotel and features a Japanese sushi bar and small plates. The Eliot is less than five minutes away from Hynes Convention Center. Nearby shopping includes the Prudential Shopping Center and Newbury Street shops. Fenway Park, home of the Boston Red Sox, is 2953 feet away.

name: The Morrison House Bed and Breakfast
description: This historic bed and breakfast is a 2 minute walk from Davis Square. It offers free Wi-Fi and serves daily breakfast. Downtown Boston is a 25 minute ride away on the T. Each room at The Morrison House is uniquely decorated in soft colors and plush bedding. They all include a flat-screen cable TV, work desk, and refrigerator. Select rooms have a private bathroom. Breakfast includes homemade baked goods, fruit, yogurt, and coffee and can be enjoyed on the terrace or in the dining room of The Morrison House B&B. Guests can browse the DVD library in the living area or use the computer and printer. Harvard University is 2 miles from the bed and breakfast. Logan International Airport is 8 miles away.

name: Hotel Aka Back Bay
description: This historic Back Bay district hotel is located in the former headquarters of the Boston Police Department. Free Wi-Fi is provided throughout the hotel and an on-site grill is available. Copley Square and Boston Common are both less than 1640 feet away. The modern, decorative rooms of the Hotel AKA Back Bay feature a 46-inch flat-screen TV. Ironing facilities and a work desk are included. Guests can also enjoy Apothecary, a lobby lounge. An on-site fitness center and a business center are open at all times for guests. Hotel AKA Back Bay is 1.6 mi from Fenway Park. The Boston Back Bay train station is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Indigo Boston Garden, An IHG Hotel
description: Nestled near North Station and TD Garden, and three miles from Logan Airport, Hotel Indigo Boston Garden offers comfort and convenience. Our renovated, pet-friendly, boutique hotel is steeped in history. Experience spacious rooms and a restaurant that blends hearty pub fare with New England charm. Enjoy our 24-hour fitness center, boardroom, and free Wi-Fi. The ideal hotel for attending Boston concerts, we’re also close to the financial center, JFK Building and GSA, healthcare facilities like Massachusetts General Hospital and Massachusetts Eye Ear, and universities like Harvard, Boston University, MIT, and Boston College. Follow the Freedom Trail and explore Faneuil Hall, Paul Revere's house, and Boston Harbor. Begin your Boston adventure.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Courtyard by Marriott Boston Copley Square
description: Located in downtown Boston's charming and vibrant Copley Square neighborhood, the historic, boutique Courtyard Boston Copley Square hotel combines old-world charm with modern amenities. Our hotel's Back Bay setting is just steps away from Boston's best shopping, restaurants, museums, and attractions like Fenway Park, Trinity Church, the Prudential Center, and Newbury Street, as well as the Hynes Convention Center, downtown's premier event destination. Our hotel lobby brings design and technology together with common spaces that offer an inviting ambiance and complimentary wi-fi. Just four miles from Boston Logan International Airport, our downtown hotel puts you in the heart of the city.Marriott

name: Charlesmark Hotel
description: Originally built in 1886 as a private residence in the heart of Boston's exclusive Back Bay neighborhood, the Charlesmark has been completely renovated to create a European style boutique hotel with an outdoor patio.Here, a "classic modernism" design is accented with the latest high technology amenities to satisfy the most savvy business or leisure traveler. Premier location. Exceptional value. European ambiance. The Charlesmark combines it all to create a memorable lodging experience.Ambiance - Genuine, Intimate ServiceAll 40 guest rooms at The Charlesmark are uniquely styled by renowned designer Dennis Duffy to provide the ultimate combination of luxury, comfort, and functionality. From custom made furniture and light-toned woodwork to imported Italian tile and elegant European lighting fixtures, each room presents a soft modern motif with a residential feel.State-of-the-art amenities include free wireless internet with 1-800 technical support, stereo systems, DVD/CD players, 32" and 39" Insignia flat screen televisions, voicemail, free direct music and satellite movie service, a movie library, individual climate control, and other custom appointments.Our highly trained staff will cater to your needs and provide genuine, warm, and intimate service that can be only truly provided at a small owner-operated hotel. The Charlesmark experience will make us your first choice when staying in Boston's exclusive Back Bay neighborhood.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Row Hotel at Assembly Row, Autograph Collection
description: Where bold character and uncommon details meet, The Row Hotel at Assembly Row, Autograph Collection is an original boutique hotel in Somerville, MA designed for the modern traveler. Combining historic charm with a modern twist, this once Ford Motor Assembly Plant offers travelers an escape from the predictable in vibrant Assembly Row – a center of shopping, dining and entertainment near Boston. At our hotel near the Boston Casino, unique perspectives and warm hospitality combine with heartfelt designs to create curated experiences, from our 24-hour fitness center and heated indoor pool, to rooms and suites that offer a sense of place, with personal touches like pillow top mattresses, ergonomic workspaces and comfy bath robes. We have over 4,000 square-feet of distinguished event venues and access to The T, with transit service to downtown Boston, TD Garden, Fenway Park, and the Boston Convention & Exhibition Center. From the warm welcome to tailored comforts, discover uncommon at our Assembly Row hotel!Marriott

name: Boston Harbor Hotel
description: Boston Harbor Hotel is conveniently located in the popular Boston City Center area. The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Boston Harbor Hotel. Flat screen television, carpeting, linens, mirror, towels can be found in selected guestrooms. To enhance guests' stay, the property offers recreational facilities such as fitness center, sauna, indoor pool, spa, massage. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Boston (MA), Boston Harbor Hotel will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: Studio Allston Hotel
description: Located in Boston, Studio Allston Hotel is a short drive from Harvard University and Boston Commons. It provides 3.5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. This unique hotel offers an on-site fitness centre, meeting rooms and a playground. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to offer assistance. Rooms at Studio Allston Hotel are comfortable and feature a refrigerator, a microwave and cable/satellite channels. They are all soundproofed and include a laptop safe, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. For those wishing to dine out during their stay at Studio Allston Hotel, there are a variety of restaurants located nearby. The hotel also offers parking for those travelling by car.Revato

name: The Newbury Boston
description: This 5-star hotel provides elegant accommodation in Boston and is within walking distance of Arlington Railway Station. It also has views of Public Garden and Boston Commons. This cosy hotel provides vip rooms, meeting rooms and a library. Honeymoon suites are available for those looking for some added luxury. There are 286 rooms at The Newbury Boston, each offering all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. The Newbury Boston offers a variety of places to have a meal, including The Rooftop and The Street Bar. A wide selection of eating options can also be found in close proximity to the property. The hotel is conveniently situated for sightseeing in Boston with the Boston Public Library and Copley Square within a 10-minute walk. Guests can also visit Prudential Center, Back Bay and Boston Freedom Trail.Revato

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Boston Back Bay/Fenway
description: Our newly renovated all-suite hotel is conveniently located steps away from Fenway Park and is the closest extended-stay hotel to Boston University, Northeastern University, Colleges of the Fenway and the Longwood Medical Center. Enjoy our stunning views overlooking Fenway Park from the only Rooftop Bar in the Fenway neighborhood, making for an ideal starting point before and after a Red Sox game. We are also close to the House of Blues and the all-new MGM Music Hall – both great venues for catching a show! Explore the city of Boston and enjoy some fabulous shopping and dining at the world-famous Newbury Street or at the Prudential and Copley Malls – both just a 20-minute walk away. Stop by the Time Out Market Place and explore dining options from the top chefs in Boston. Alternatively, you can take a bike ride along the Charles River and enjoy the views. Plus, at our hotel near Back Bay Boston, we also have a great indoor swimming pool that is always a big hit for the entire family!Marriott

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Boston Seaport District
description: We're near the waterfront, a five-minute walk from the Flynn Cruise Terminal. The BCEC, Rockland Trust Bank Pavilion, wharf dining, and several museums are within a mile. Join us for free breakfast, or prep favorites in your suite's full kitchen. An indoor pool and 24-hour fitness center await, and we have sunlit ballrooms and two outdoor terraces for events.Hilton

name: Beacon Hill Hotel
description: Set in a prime location of Boston (MA), Beacon Hill Hotel & Bistro puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The property offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Facilities like 100% non-smoking are readily available for you to enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Friendly staff, great facilities, and close proximity to all that Boston (MA) has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Beacon Hill Hotel & Bistro.Agoda

name: The Charles Hotel
description: Set in the heart of Harvard Square, this luxurious Cambridge hotel combines classic New England style with award-winning dining, elegant guestrooms and 24-hour personalized concierge services. Each of the rooms at The Charles Hotel in Harvard Square offers flat-screen TVs and DVD players. Guests can also enjoy free access to a nearby state-of-the-art fitness center as well as the on-site library and wireless internet access. While staying at the Charles, guests can take advantage of gourmet on-site dining options, such as the vibrant jazz club, the Regattabar. Classic New England cuisine is available at Henrietta's Table and rustic Italian dishes are featured at Benedetto. Popular area attractions, including the famed Harvard University are only moments from the Charles in Harvard Square. A number of charming cafes, shops and restaurants are also easily accessible. Boston city center is a short drive away with on-site car hire services.

name: Boston Marriott Cambridge
description: Boston Marriott Cambridge exudes modern style and exceptional service and offers an unparalleled location in trendy Kendall Square. Tour the campuses of nearby MIT and Harvard Universities, experience a ballgame at historic Fenway Park, enjoy a stroll along the Charles River, be inspired on the Innovation Trail tour, or for the perfect family-friendly activity, visit the Museum of Science or MIT Museum. Our hotel in Kendall Square, Cambridge, MA, is steps away from the Red Line and provides easy access to downtown Boston, just two subway stops away. You can take in all the sights, shopping and more along Newbury Street and Back Bay. Plan future meetings or social events in nearly 13,000 square feet of versatile event space. At the end of your day, unwind in our modern guest rooms and suites and enjoy fantastic amenities like our 24-hour fitness center, complete with Peloton® bikes and the M Club Lounge.Marriott

name: The Boxer
description: The Boxer is a recently renovated boutique Boston hotel that exudes a relaxed sophistication with an urban industrial chic design. Our Boston North End Hotel is near Beacon Hill, ideally situated near many of Bostons most historic attractions. Whether its a concert at TD Garden or a run along the scenic Charles River, The Boxers downtown Boston location is convenient for guests to enjoy all that downtown Boston has to offer. The Boxer prides itself on offering personalized service and treating guests as friends and family. The hotel offers a range of amenities that cater to both the business and leisure traveler, including a standard check in time of 3PM and check out time of 12pm-so you can make the most out of your time in Boston. Finch, our onsite Boston restaurant, serves light bites, breakfast and dinner in a decor that is traditional Boston with an eclectic twist. With health and well-being top of mind, we have developed REST ASSURED, a 5-point program designed to ensure guests and staff may be put at ease while on property. Program standards, including advanced cleaning protocols, physical distancing, and transparent communication, are based on guidance from the Centers for Disease Control (CDC), World Health Organization (WHO), and American Hotel and Lodging Association (AHLA). No detail has been left unturned and we thank you for staying with us.iHotelier/iStay

name: Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Boston Cambridge
description: Our stylish East Cambridge hotel is just steps to the Lechmere ‘T’ subway and the Museum of Science. Our location connects you to the unique ‘squares’ and neighborhoods of Cambridge, Boston, Somerville and beyond. Visit and shop popular destinations by subway or walk to. TD Boston Garden, Cambridge Crossing, Museum of Science, Charles River experiences, Fenway Park, Kendall Square, Faneuil Hall, North End and Back Bay. Traveling with purpose.MIT EF Education First, Hult School of Business, HubSpot, and Massachusetts General Hospital MGH. home to Philips, Sanofi, and Bristol Myers Squibb, is within walking distance. Also nearby are the BCEC Convention Center, Boston University, Tufts, and Harvard. Our thoughtfully designed guest rooms and suites are built for the savvy traveler. Guestrooms feature Wi-Fi, flexible workspace, mini-fridge, microwave, and 39-inch, LED flat-screen TV. Enjoy our on-site Lobby Bar & LounMarriott

name: Boston Marriott Long Wharf
description: Sailboats glide across the water as the city skyline gleams in the background. This is Boston’s iconic waterfront – and Boston Marriott Long Wharf is where the harbor comes to life. Only a short water taxi ride from Logan Airport, our artfully designed hotel near downtown Waterfront welcomes you with the irresistible energy of Boston Harbor. Steps from the New England Aquarium and historic Faneuil Hall, our desirable location is the place where modern revolutionaries meet and explore all that Boston has to offer. Walk in the footsteps of history along the Freedom Trail – or write your own story from the elegant wedding and event venues overlooking Boston Harbor. Stylish rooms and suites offer the ultimate urban retreat with spa bathrooms and striking water or city views. Enjoy our heated indoor pool and 24-hour fitness center, or dine beside the shimmering harborside. The multi-level M Club is a private space for eligible Marriott Bonvoy® members to work, connect, or unwind in an exclusive lounge.Marriott

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Boston Downtown/South End
description: Set a pace that suits you at Marriott Residence Inn Boston Downtown/South End. Whether you're with us for a few days or a few months, your routine matters. Thrive at one of the most modern hotels in Roxbury, MA with the conveniences of home you need. Like spacious studio and one-bedroom suites with separate living and sleeping areas. A fully equipped kitchen ready for your favorite cuisine. Complimentary grocery delivery service to fill your refrigerator and satisfy cravings. Free Wi-Fi for connecting to work and the outside world. Free hot breakfast to start mornings off right. Our South End Boston hotel's fitness center will help strengthen your body and soul. Relax when you want, but stay focused and productive when it's essential. Stay close to what's important to you at our hotel near Boston Children's Hospital, Northeastern University & Tufts Medical Center. At Residence Inn, we'll make sure you thrive during your stay at Marriott Residence Inn Boston.Marriott

name: Sheraton Commander Hotel
description: Timeless elegance is interwoven with modern conveniences at Sheraton Commander Hotel in Cambridge, Massachusetts. Our hotel near Harvard Square is located near boutiques and restaurants as well as prestigious academic institutions such as Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Harvard University and Tufts University. Paying homage to our colonial heritage, our hotel boasts a modern design with subtle, revolutionary-era flair. Amenities such as free high-speed Wi-Fi, flat-panel TVs and plush bedding transform our hotel rooms into a quaint retreat amid the bustle of Harvard Square. Nubar, our on-site restaurant, serves classic New England cuisine with an innovative twist. If business brings you to Cambridge, our hotel in Cambridge, MA, features five elegant meeting venues, AV equipment and custom catering services, ideal for networking events and corporate conferences. From our paramount location to our thoughtful amenities, you can expect a legendary stay at Sheraton Commander Hotel.Marriott

name: Marriott Vacation Club Pulse at Custom House, Boston
description: Marriott Vacation Club Pulse at Custom House, Boston welcomes guests to the original customs building that first welcomed new Americans to the United States. Located in the heart of Boston, our family-friendly vacation rental property offers one-bedroom suites near popular landmarks like the waterfront, Quincy Market, Prudential Center, the Boston Opera House and the historic Freedom Trail. After a day exploring Boston, return to a spacious vacation rental with separate living and sleeping areas, plus a kitchenette. Many of our suites offer stunning views of Boston Harbor or the downtown Boston skyline. Dine anytime with local restaurant delivery, recharge with a visit to our fitness center or admire the view from the open-air observation deck on our 26th floor. Enjoy family-friendly amenities like our property's on-site movie theater and game room. However you choose to spend your time in Boston, we look forward to welcoming you to our comfortable vacation rentals.Marriott

name: Four Seasons Hotel Boston
description: Located within steps of the Boston Common and the Public Garden, this Four Seasons has rooms with views of Boston. The hotel has facilities like an indoor pool, fitness center and spa. A flat-screen cable TV is included in every room at the Boston Four Seasons. There are also free toiletries, slippers and a bathrobe in the private bathroom. On-site dining at the Bistro Lounge offers breakfast, lunch and dinner. The Boston Opera House is 2297 feet from the hotel. The train at Arlington Station is 656 feet away.

name: Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston
description: Featuring a bar, Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston is located in the center of Boston, a 4-minute walk from Hynes Convention Center. Offering a restaurant, the property also has free bikes, as well as an indoor pool and a fitness center. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. All rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms are equipped with a coffee machine, while some rooms also feature a terrace and others also feature city views. At Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston every room includes bed linen and towels. Speaking English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Back Bay, Boston Museum of Fine Arts and Fenway Park. The nearest airport is Logan Airport, 5.6 miles from Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston.

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Boston Watertown
description: The Residence Inn is Watertown’s first all-suite hotel, across from Arsenal Yards and the Charles River, where Boston meets Cambridge. Our Watertown, MA, hotel boasts spacious studio, one- and two-bedroom suites with separate living and sleeping areas. Each suite includes a fully equipped kitchen ready for your favorite cuisine. Guests enjoy free internet, and a free breakfast is provided daily to start mornings off right. Our on-site 24-hour fitness center will keep your routine in check. Our hotel is minutes from Cambridge’s Harvard Square and Harvard University, Perkins School for the Blind, Commander’s Mansion, MIT, Arsenal Yards, Athenahealth Campus and downtown Boston. Our extended stay in Watertown, MA, is conveniently located only 9 miles from Boston's Logan Airport, and we offer paid parking for $28 per day per vehicle.Marriott

name: Cambria Hotel Boston, Downtown - South Boston
description: Experience accommodations and a convenient location when staying at our hotel South Boston, right outside of downtown. Amenities include free WiFi, meeting space, a fitness center, restaurant and rooftop bar. Stylish guest rooms feature microwaves and refrigerators, separate work areas, flat-screen TVs, Keurig coffee makers and Bath and Body Works bath products. The new Cambria Hotel Boston, Downtown-South Boston is just steps away from shopping, dining and entertainment. You will also be near the Sports Museum, Copley Place, Boston Convention and Exhibition Center, Skywalk Observatory, Boston Duck Tours, Boston Tea Party Ships and Museum, Lawn On D, Prudential Tower and the Hynes Convention Center. We are located near the US Army Department, Massachusetts General Hospital and several corporate offices. Get ready to enjoy friendly, professional service at our upscale hotel in Boston, MA. And do not forget that you can earn rewards, including free nights and gift cards, with our Choice Privileges Rewards program. No pets allowed.Choice Hotels

name: Boston Marriott Copley Place
description: Bostonians strolling historic brick-lined sidewalks in front of majestic brownstones, while sail boats glide nearby along the Charles River. This is Boston’s Back Bay, and Boston Marriott Copley Place stands tall in the center of it all. Stay moments from top Boston attractions, including Newbury Street, Fenway Park, and directly connected to over 200 premier restaurants and shops at the Prudential Center and Copley Place Mall. Experience an expansive 24-hour fitness center, indoor pool, and a brand new exclusive M Club. Each of our reimagined hotel rooms and suites features sleek decor, platform beds, spa-like bathrooms, and remarkable city views. Satiate cravings with freshly-prepared meals delivered by A la Carte in-room dining, or catch a game on a big screen while dining at Yard House. Plan future meetings and social affairs at our Back Bay, Boston, MA hotel in 70,000 square feet of versatile event space, enhanced by expert planners and one of the largest ballrooms in New England.Marriott

name: Kimpton Marlowe Hotel
address: 25 Edwin H. Land Boulevard, Cambridge, MA 02141
description: An alluring courtyard with an interactive celestial sculpture welcomes guests to our inspiring Cambridge getaway on the Charles River. While Kimpton Marlowe Hotel emphasizes luxury and lavish style, it also links the intellectual and innovative spirit of Boston and Cambridge. Guests attend to the mind, body and soul in renovated guestrooms and suites that feature calming colors, locally-inspired artwork, custom furnishings and (often) sensational views; thoughtful amenities place a focus on staying fit, pampered and well-fed—thanks to Bambara Kitchen + Bar—while in our care.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Cambria Hotel Boston Somerville
description: Enjoy an upscale stay in the heart of one of the trendiest neighborhoods in Boston. Between Union and Porter Squares, the Cambria Hotel Boston Somerville in Somerville is just over a half mile from Harvard University and near Tufts University and MIT. Join us for dinner at Josephine which is is a celebration of family and food thats focused on pizza, Italian favorites and the simple pleasure of dining together. The hotel is also across the street from Somernova, a business park and innovation incubator. Walk to restaurants, cocktail lounges and breweries. Modern guestrooms offer plush bedding and spa inspired bathrooms with oversize showers and Bluetooth mirrors. Each room also features free WiFi and a flatscreen TV, as well as conveniences like a desk space, a refrigerator and a coffee maker.Choice Hotels

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Boston Cambridge
description: Experience a refreshing getaway at the newly renovated Residence Inn Boston Cambridge. Relax and recharge in expansive apartment-style accommodations with fully equipped kitchens, separate living spaces and a thoughtful collection of modern amenities. Fuel up for a full day of business or sightseeing with a free breakfast buffet and stay active in our 24-hour fitness center featuring Peloton® Bikes and Matrix Fitness Equipment. Our hotel in Kendall Square, Cambridge, MA, is just one subway stop away from downtown Boston and close to many attractions including the Museum of Science, Fenway Park, Harvard University, MIT, TD Garden, Encore Boston Harbor and more. Host an intimate meeting in the boardroom or a larger gathering for up to 100 guests in the redesigned meeting space of our hotel near Boston, MA. With free Wi-Fi, a convenient hotel Market and new Theory Bar & Lounge offering cocktails and light fare, the Residence Inn Boston Cambridge has everything you need for a relaxing stay in a historic city.Marriott

name: InterContinental Boston
description: Historic elegance meets modern luxury at the InterContinental Boston. Our waterfront hotel, located on the Boston Harbor, is one of the city's most celebrated hotels in a truly iconic location. Our beautifully redesigned rooms showcase the Boston cityscape with floor to ceiling windows. Whether hosting an event or relaxing in our Spa InterContinental, you will appreciate the close proximity to Boston’s most sought-after landmarks, like the Boston Tea Party & Ships Museum.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: TownePlace Suites by Marriott Boston Logan Airport/Chelsea
description: Make yourself at home at TownePlace Suites Boston Logan Airport/Chelsea. Our hotel in Chelsea MA offers everything you need for a productive extended stay. Our complimentary airport shuttle from 4:00am until 1:00am makes it a quick trip to and from Boston Logan Airport. Recharge in our pet friendly suites with large desks, plush Marriott bedding, and fully equipped kitchens. During your stay, enjoy easy access to top attractions like the Seaport District, Downtown Boston, and Freedom Trail with the Silver Line SL3 Eastern Avenue station walking distance from our hotel. Our convenient location makes our hotel suites a great choice for your upcoming Chelsea group stay. No matter how long you're in town, make the most of it at TownePlace Suites Boston Logan Airport/Chelsea.Marriott

name: The Verb Hotel
description: Situated within walking distance of St. Marys Street MBTA Subway Station, The Verb Hotel provides guests with a convenient base while visiting Boston. It has a gym, as well as an outdoor pool, a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. This modern hotel provides a number of facilities, such as luggage storage, a concierge and a car rental desk. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to offer local information. The air conditioned rooms at The Verb Hotel are well-appointed. They feature blackout curtains, a refrigerator and an in-room safe. In-house dining options include Hojoko, which provides an ideal place to enjoy a meal. Boston's attractions, including Kenmore Square and Back Bay Fens, are within easy walking distance of The Verb Hotel. It is also within walking distance of Berklee College of Music, the Museum of Fine Arts and Northeastern University.Revato

name: The Kendall Hotel
description: Originally built in 1894, this historic Victorian-style boutique hotel is located adjacent to the MIT Campus in Cambridge, and features a unique and cozy atmosphere, complete with many modern conveniences. Just outside the Kendall's front doors is the area's fantastic public transportation system. This location allows guests to easily access all the areas of the city, including downtown Boston and Harvard University, both only a short distance away. After a restful night of sleep in individually decorated rooms, guests at The Kendall Hotel at the Engine 7 Firehouse can start the morning with a variety of breakfast buffet items, or work out at a nearby fitness center with complimentary access. A wine hour is hosted each night in the Rooftop Retreat.

name: Staybridge Suites - Boston Logan Airport - Revere, An IHG Hotel
description: A brand new dual branded, extended stay hotel just 2 miles from Boston Logan Airport and walking distance to Revere Beach. Quick access to Beachmont Subway Station on Boston’s MBTA, offers guests access to explore Faneuil Hall, Fenway Park, Boston Common, Historic North End and Boston’s new Seaport District. In town for an extended project near the FBI Headquarters, General Electric Aviation Campus, or Amazon Distribution Center? Look no further. Or in need of a place to relax after appointments at Mass General Hospital, Boston Children’s Hospital, Lahey Hospital, Beth Israel Deaconess or Brigham and Woman’s Hospital? Then our spacious suites will offer a home away from home while you’re on the road. Students and parents alike find the central location and access to Boston Colleges and Universities ideal, from Harvard University, MIT, Boston University to North Shore locations like Salem State University and Endicott College. Uniquely integrated under the same roof with the Holiday Inn Express, this hotel boast 72 Studio Suites with fully equipped kitchens. Offering enhanced shared amenities including a complimentary breakfast buffet, free Wi-Fi, onsite lobby bar and lounge, 24-hour market and business center, fitness facility, and onsite parking Complimentary Airport Shuttle hours are 5:00am to 11:00am and 3:00pm to 11:00pm daily.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hilton Garden Inn Boston Brookline, MA
description: We are about a mile from Fenway Park outside of the Medical Center Area. There are seven bus stops and four light rail stations within a half mile of our hotel. Beth Israel Deaconess and Jamaica Plain VA Medical Centers are within a mile. Take a tour of Harvard University less than 10 minutes away. We provide a shuttle to the Longwood Medical Area.Hilton

name: Clarendon Square
description: No description found

name: The Inn at St Botolph
description: This inn is in Boston's historic Back Bay, one block from the Shops at Prudential Center and subway station. A kitchenette and 42-inch flat-screen TV is offered in every suite. Inn at St. Botolph features studios and suites with Wi-Fi and alarm clocks with USB ports. Decorative non-operable fireplaces are included in the one bedroom suites. A continental breakfast is served every morning in the St. Botolph Inn's lounge. Guests can use the modern fitness center or the on-site business center. Original art pieces are also included throughout the inn.

name: Newbury Guest House
description: This historic guest house is located in Boston's Back Bay district, only 2 minutes' walk from the Hynes Convention Center and various shops along Newbury Street. The guest house offers free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour front desk. Newbury Guest House consists of 3 connected town houses. A designer boutique store is available on site and the Newbury Guest House features our on-site bakery, Patisserie On Newbury. Guest rooms at the Guest House on Newbury are equipped with 37-inch flat-screen TV and DVD players. Mini-refrigerators and safety deposit boxes are also included in each room. The Shops at Prudential Center and the Hynes Convention Center Subway Station are 5 minutes' walk from the Newbury Guest House in Boston. The Boston Common and Fenway Park are both 1 mi away.

name: Boston Yacht Haven
description: This waterfront inn features an on-site marina that is filled with boats during the summer season. All rooms feature free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and views of the harbor or city. Faneuil Hall/Quincy Market is 10 minutes’ walk away. Each room at Boston Yacht Haven has nautical theme decor, a microwave, and a refrigerator. Select rooms include a sea view, private balcony, or sofa bed. A fitness center is available for guests to use at the Commercial Wharf Boston Yacht Haven. Laundry facilities are available as well. A free continental breakfast is served each morning. Various waterfront dining options, including the Chart House Restaurant and Joe's American Bar & Grill are within 5 minutes’ walk from the inn. The New England Aquarium is half a mile from the Yacht Haven. Boston Common is 1 mile away.

name: Longwood Inn
description: Nestled in the peaceful residential neighborhood of Brookline, near the attractions of downtown Boston, this cozy inn offers comfortable amenities in an ideal location. Longwood Inn is a beautiful Victorian mansion that is just minutes from the subway. The surrounding area is filled with restaurants, stores and several of the city's hospitals. Guests will also enjoy the adjacent park, which features tennis courts, a playground and a running track. Guests at the Longwood will appreciate the inn's fully equipped kitchen and dining room. After a busy day, guests can relax in the lounge area and use the free wireless internet access.

name: The Ritz-Carlton Boston
description: With an enviable location opposite Boston Common, The Ritz-Carlton, Boston provides contemporary urban luxury in downtown Boston, MA. Our 193 hotel rooms and suites feature expansive views and sleek styling, and fully updated meeting spaces offer a welcoming atmosphere for conferences and social events. Additional hotel features include the Avery Bar, with its signature martinis and mid-century glamour, and the adjoining Equinox Sports Club. Explore all that our luxury hotel in downtown Boston has to offer.Marriott

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Boston Cleveland Circle
description: Connect to the city in a new way at AC Boston Hotel Cleveland Circle, located at the crossroads of academia and athletics, history and entertainment, Boston and Brookline. Infused with European style, Spanish flair, and Boston soul, our boutique hotel offers innovative spaces, tailored to the needs of creative, well-traveled, entrepreneurial spirits, including a daily European-style breakfast and free WiFi throughout the hotel, 50-inch Smart TVs, comfortable pillow-top mattresses and ergonomic inroom workspaces. A convenient business center, flexible event venues, and a 24-hour fitness center allow you to work and meet where you choose. Every evening, unwind at the AC Lounge, where our bartenders serve handcrafted cocktails to pair with specialty tapas. Our hotel is also ideally located near Boston University, Fenway Park, Agganis Arena, Reservoir and Cleveland Circle Stations, MBTA Green Line, for further Boston adventures. Welcome to an elevated state of mind.Marriott

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Boston Harbor on Tudor Wharf
description: Boston's rich history is right outside your door when you stay at the Residence Inn by Marriott Boston Harbor on Tudor Wharf. Our all-suite hotel near downtown Boston is conveniently located and within walking distance of the historic North End, Boston Harbor and TD Garden. Our waterfront Boston hotel offers a choice of studio, one- or two-bedroom suites, all with amazing Boston Harbor views and beautiful interior decor. Unique amongst Boston extended stay hotels, our hotel offers a stylish retreat at a substantial value; free Wi-Fi access, a complimentary daily hot breakfast buffet, a heated indoor pool and an evening mix Monday through Wednesday. All our beautiful suites come equipped with full kitchens, refrigerators, cooktops, separate living and dining areas, and ample space to relax or entertain. Escape from typical Boston hotels and discover the distinctive style of the Residence Inn, a Marriott extended stay Harbor view hotel in Boston.Marriott

name: Moxy Boston Downtown
description: Don't settle for an ordinary hotel experience at Moxy Boston Downtown. Our boutique hotel offers the modern conveniences you need in a hip, party-loving atmosphere. Our incredible location gets the party started by putting you center stage of all the entertainment that Boston, MA, has to offer. When you visit our hotel on Tremont Street in Boston, you will find yourself near Fenway Park, Chinatown, Boston Common, art galleries, theaters, and local nightlife. Back at our hotel, enjoy our signature cocktail on the house. Afterward, wander through our hotel and check out our wildly fun Bar Moxy, large writing walls, 56-inch projection TV, photo booth and 24-hour grab-and-go marketplace. With all the modern conveniences our downtown hotel in Boston offers, you might be tempted to just chill out. So when it's time to crash, head on up to your loft-inspired hotel room with ultra-modern furnishings, free Wi-Fi and walk-in showers. At our downtown Boston, MA, hotel, we provide the stage, you create your story.Marriott

name: Doubletree Suites By Hilton Hotel Boston - Cambridge
description: The DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Boston – Cambridge offers an ideal location along the scenic banks of the Charles River. Discover a warm welcome and comfortable accommodation at our all-suite Boston hotel. Relax and spread out during your stay in one of our two-room suites at the DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Boston - Cambridge. Each two-room suite provides homelike comforts including a fridge, microwave, coffee maker, room service and LCD flat-screen HDTV. Discover some of the best entertainment in Boston at the legendary Scullers Jazz Club. This award-winning Jazz Club offers world-class entertainment and spectacular views of the Boston skyline. Treat yourself to dinner and a show, or enjoy the casual environment and inspired flavors of The Green Room, open for breakfast and dinner. Host a meeting or event in the 9,500 sq. ft. of versatile meeting and ballroom space. Hold an elegant cocktail reception on the area’s only rooftop terrace, with dazzling views of Boston, or let our event services team put together your special occasion in our ballroom overlooking the Charles River. Enjoy customized menus and a 24-hour business center providing complimentary internet access. Unwind with a cocktail and watch your favorite sports team on our two large LCD TVs, or enjoy light food and complimentary internet access at Fusion, our modern all-day lounge. Our friendly staff looks forward to welcoming you to this Boston hotel with the legendary warm DoubleTree chocolate chip cookie.Hilton

name: The Revolution Hotel
description: The Revolution Hotel has free bikes, fitness center, a shared lounge and restaurant in Boston. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and an ATM, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is a 5-minute walk from Back Bay, and within 0.9 miles of the city center. A business center and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at the hotel. Popular points of interest near The Revolution Hotel include Boston Public Garden, Boston Common and Boston South Station. The nearest airport is Logan Airport, 4.3 miles from the accommodation.

name: The Colonnade Hotel
description: Located in downtown Boston, this luxury hotel is adjacent to the Prudential Center and 1.8 miles from Fenway Park. It features a seasonal rooftop pool and spacious rooms with a 58-inch flat-screen TV. The Colonnade Hotel is a 7-minute walk from Symphony Hall and across from Prudential Train Station. Harvard Yard and Logan International Airport are both a 15-minute drive away. An iPod docking station is one of the modern amenities in every room at The Colonnade. All rooms feature floor-to-ceiling windows and a Keurig coffee maker. Sleek black and white décor and a seating area complete each room. Free access to the state-of-the-art fitness center is provided to all guests. The helpful concierge service can help arrange travel details.

name: Staypineapple, A Delightful Hotel, South End
description: Located in Boston's historic South End, this European-style boutique hotel offers modern guest rooms with free WiFi. Staypineapple, South End is within walking distance to many popular restaurants and attractions. Every room at The Staypineapple, South End features a flat-screen TV and iPod docking station. The private bathroom includes a walk-in marble shower. A work desk and telephone with access to the 24-hour front desk are provided for guest convenience. Only steps from the completely nonsmoking property are some of the city's most famous sites. The scenic Back Bay area, as well as the unique shops and gourmet restaurants of Newbury Street are within 10 minutes' walk.

name: The Whitney Hotel Boston
description: The Whitney Hotel, a new 65-room luxury hotel, will offer guests generous hospitality through sophisticated simplicity and cultured comforts. Named after Henry Melville Whitney, a prominent Boston industrialist and one-time owner of the hotel site, the property is a haven apart from the urban hustle, welcoming guests with uncomplicated, urbane luxury, complemented by the comforts and indulgences of home.
