With health and well-being top of mind, we have developed REST ASSURED, a 5-point program designed to ensure guests and staff may be put at ease while on property. Program standards, including advanced cleaning protocols, physical distancing, and transparent communication, are based on guidance from the Centers for Disease Control (CDC), World Health Organization (WHO), and American Hotel and Lodging Association (AHLA). No detail has been left unturned and we thank you for staying with us.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Lenox
description: Centered in Boston's historic Back Bay area, this boutique hotel features a state-of-the-art gym, award-winning dining and elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi. John Hancock Tower is 5 minutes’ walk away. Each room boasts panoramic views of the Back Bay neighborhood. Flat-screen TVs, a small fridge and plush terry bathrobes are provided. The luxury rooms offer mahogany furniture and crystal lamps. Hotel Lenox offers personalized concierge services and a 24-hour business center. Guests can enjoy Irish food at Sólás, an authentic Boston Irish pub. City-Table restaurant serves contemporary American cuisine made from fresh ingredients. Room service is available 24 hours. The Lenox is 3 blocks from famous restaurants and shops on Newbury Street. Fenway Park baseball stadium is just 1 mile from the hotel and Northeastern University is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Hyatt Regency Boston/Cambridge
description: Located 2 miles from Harvard Square, this Cambridge, MA hotel features on-site dining. Boston city center is 3 miles away. A flat-screen cable TV, iPod dock, coffee maker, and free toiletries are included in the rooms at the Hyatt Regency Boston/Cambridge, Overlooking Boston. The rooms also include a sofa and desk. This Hyatt Regency features concierge service and 24-hour front desk assistance. The hotel also has on-site fitness and and offers dining options from Paperback Tavern & Provisions to Paperback Provisions. Massachusetts Institute of Technology is less than a mile from the hotel. Fenway Park, home of the Boston Red Sox baseball team, is 1.8 miles away.

name: Porter Square Hotel
description: Porter Square Hotel is centrally located in the heart of Cambridge, just steps away from the MBTA Red Line train. We are easily accessible to colleges and universities in the area. Lesley College is only a 2-minute walk away! The campuses of Harvard University, Tufts University, and Massachusetts Institute of Technology are within a 3-mile radius of the hotel. If youre looking to stay here while you check out the many cultural attractions that Cambridge has to offer, the museums in the hotels vicinity include Harvard Museum of Natural History, the MIT Museum, and the Museum of Science, all within a 20-minute trip from the hotels front door. Taking a day trip into downtown Boston one may have interest in visiting the sites. Were a quick 20-minute train ride from the famous Boston Common, and the start of the Freedom Trail. Those with an artistic interest, The Museum of Fine Arts and the Institute of Contemporary Art are within a 5-mile drive of the hotel.Our rooms are equipped with 48 inch flat-screen Smart TV's, Wi-Fi, comfortable bathrobes, slippers, and all the other amenities one would expect while traveling. The suites have a separate living area with an additional 48 inch flat-screen Smart TV, comfortable couches or chairs, a desk, and closet for all your long term, or business stay needs. Those looking to indulge in even more relaxation can do so in our lovely courtyard (opening in Spring 2017). We provide 24-hour service from our front desk concierge, and valet teams. The experienced staff are well versed in the direct neighborhood as well as the many attractions we have around Cambridge and Boston metro areas. They can suggest the best of restaurants and bars in the area as well as providing you with travel directions. The hotel is a quick 30-minute ride on the Red Line from South Station, and Logan International Airport is 8 miles away.iHotelier/iStay

name: Courtyard by Marriott Boston Cambridge
description: Courtyard Boston Cambridge surrounds guests with historic New England charm. Find our hotel on Memorial Drive in Cambridge, MA. We're conveniently located near destinations like the Public Garden, Central Square, Faneuil Hall Marketplace and Fenway Park. Tour the nearby campuses of Boston University, MIT and Harvard University or browse the shops at Back Bay or Newbury Street. Enjoy modern Japanese fare at Bisuteki Tokyo Japanese Steakhouse and Sushi Bar, one of our hotel restaurants. Maintain your fitness regimen with a workout in our 24-hour fitness center, which features cardio equipment and free weights. Then retire to spacious hotel lodgings, some with views of downtown Boston or the Charles River. Stay productive in Cambridge at your room's spacious work desk or catch up on your favorite series with a 40-inch flat-screen HDTV. Whether you're visiting Massachusetts for work or pleasure, modern comforts and amenities await at Courtyard Boston Cambridge.Marriott

name: Hotel 1868
description: Hotel 1868 is centrally located in the heart of Cambridge, just steps away from the MBTA Red Line train. We provide 24-hour service from our front desk concierge and valet teams, as well as a health club and a business/meeting center. The experienced staff are well versed in the direct neighborhood as well as the many attractions we have around the Cambridge and Boston metro areas.iHotelier/iStay
